question: According to the transcript, what was prophesied about Oedipus since his birth?

options: Athens
Colonus
Thebes

options: Apollo

Athena
The Eumenides (Furies)
answer: The Eumenides (Furies)

options: They welcome him warmly
They immediately call for Theseus

To take Oedipus back to Thebes

options: He appeals to Theseus for help
He captures Antigone and threatens Ismene
He offers Oedipus wealth and power

options: The Eumenides
The elders of Colonus

options: He dies peacefully in his sleep

options: To reconcile his sons
To wage war against Thebes
To keep his grave location secret and protect his daughters
